original_text: They went into the inner part of the house as if to get some wheat, and they stabbed him in the stomach. Then Rekab and his brother Baanah slipped away.
korean_text: 레갑과 그의 형제 바아나가 밀을 가지러 온 체하고 집 가운데로 들어가서 그의 배를 찌르고 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: They went into the inner part of the house
as if to get some wheat
and they stabbed him in the stomach
Then Rekab and his brother Baanah
